title: gothic font
content:
hi to all, someone have an idea to identify this font?  
thanx

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202133542im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/ittlg_cover_5804.jpg)

 [‹ LIVE](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202133542/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43220 "Go to previous forum topic") [celtic font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202133542/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43203 "Go to next forum topic")
author: rockberto

comments.content:
I think this may be a mix, with initials from a different font than the other letters. The more I look at it, the more I believe that this is handlettered, because the identical letters don’t appear to be identically formed. It seems based on something like [Uncia](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202133542/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/uncia/). This is for the majority of the letters. The initials are strange, almost more like Blackletter initials, although the G in Glass doesn’t look familiar at all.

- Mike Yanega
